value.title: Blend Power BI datasets with Excel files? INSANE AMAZING!
value.excerpt: The moment you've been waiting for! What Marco Russo calls the holy grail of BI. Tessa Hurr walks us through the new DirectQuery over Power BI datasets feature in the December 2020 release.  Connect with Tessa on Twitter: https://twitter.com/tessahurr  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership

value.title: Create a Power BI Template file in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: In this 2 minute Tuesday, Patrick shows you how to export a Power BI Template file and then use that to create a new Power BI report within Power BI Desktop.  ******** LET'S CONNECT! ********  -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube -- http://twitter.com/awsaxton -- http://twitter.com/patrickdba -- http://www.facebook.com/guyinacube

value.title: Dynamically change chart axis in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick builds on a blog post from Scott Senkeresty to dynamically change the axis of your visual within Power BI. This uses a combination of Power Query and DAX.  Chris Cook - @Finalyst89  Scott Senkeresty – @ScottSenkeresty  Dynamically changing chart axis http://tinylizard.com/dynamically-changing-chart-axis/

value.title: Filter Power BI reports using a URL query string
value.excerpt: In this video, I show you how to filter Power BI reports, within the Power BI service, using a URL query string. value.title: No Calendar Table? How to add Fiscal Month and Sort in Power BI?

value.title: Power BI Relationships Not Working? Four Steps to Debug 🐞 for the Power BI Beginner
value.excerpt: Are your Power BI Relationships not working? It can be so frustrating when that happens. The good news is that the four steps shown in this video will help you debug most of your Power BI Relationships problems.  00:00 Introduction 01:05 Tip #1 Debug Using Simple Table 02:03 Tip #2 Debug Using Simple
